snippet.title: MFP: My Friend Pedro - Trailer
snippet.description:
http://www.deadtoast.com
https://twitter.com/deadtoast_com
https://www.facebook.com/DeadtoastCom

Music by The Living Tombstone: http://www.youtube.com/user/TheLivingTombstone

"Hello. It's me. Pedro. Your friend. We are going on an adventure. Just you and me!"
Led by your imaginary friend (who happens to be a banana) you embark on an adventure that mainly involves blasting inconsiderate gangsters in the face with a wide variety of weapons.
